title: Luxury Apartment in Dukley Gardens
description: Beautiful modern apartment with mountain views in the prestigious Dukley Gardens development. Features premium finishes and access to resort amenities.

title: Waterfront Villa in Lustica Bay
description: Stunning villa with direct sea access and panoramic Adriatic views. Traditional stone architecture meets modern luxury.

title: Penthouse in Porto Montenegro
description: Exclusive penthouse in the heart of Porto Montenegro yacht marina. Luxury living with premium yacht berth included.

title: Modern Apartment in Porto Novi
description: Contemporary apartment in the exclusive Porto Novi resort with access to world-class amenities and pristine beaches.

title: Seaside Villa with Pool
description: Magnificent villa overlooking the UNESCO-protected Kotor Bay. Private pool, garden, and boat dock included.

title: Mountain Retreat in Zabljak
description: Peaceful mountain cabin near Durmitor National Park. Perfect for nature lovers seeking tranquility and adventure.
